lines.text: It just goes to show ya that a one-eyed jack rabbit can beat a king.
[Sam is searching through the cookbook for the recipe for hassenpfeffer when he is interrupted by a knock on the door. It's Bugs Bunny]

Good afternoon. Let me introduce myself as one of the woodland creatures residing in the King's forest, and being that there is such a close relationship, I assume it would not be too improper to borrow a cup of diced carrots, huh?
[he slams the door shut in Bugs' face]
Dirty, no-account, woodland creature rabbits always borrowin' things.
